scripts.release:frontend: git subtree push --prefix frontend origin release/frontend
scripts.release:backend: git subtree push --prefix backend origin release/backend
scripts.publish:frontend: git subtree push --prefix frontend heroku-frontend master
scripts.publish:backend: git subtree push --prefix backend heroku-backend master
scripts.stop: heroku ps:scale web=0 --app thegameprototype && heroku ps:scale web=0 --app thegame-backend
scripts.start: heroku ps:scale web=1 --app thegameprototype && heroku ps:scale web=1 --app thegame-backend
